lead_paragraph: Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump, a golf resort developer who has railed against Mexico in the 2016 campaign, lost an important golf tournament to that country on Wednesday when the PGA Tour said it would leave his Trump Doral course in Miami.

headline.print_headline: Trump Blasts PGA Tour for Plan to Move Golf Tournament to Mexico
headline.main: Trump Blasts PGA Tour for Plan to Move Golf Tournament to Mexico
